description: Gets the properties of a batch segment job including name, Amazon Resource Name (ARN), status, input and output configurations, and the ARN of the solution version used to generate segments.

parameters.name: batchSegmentJobArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the batch segment job to describe.

nested_items.name: batchSegmentJob
nested_items.description: Information on the specified batch segment job.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name of the batch segment job.

nested_items.name: batchSegmentJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the batch segment job.

nested_items.name: filterArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the filter used on the batch segment job.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If the batch segment job failed, the reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: solutionVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the solution version used by the batch segment job to generate batch segments.

nested_items.name: numResults
nested_items.description: The number of predicted users generated by the batch segment job for each line of input data. The maximum number of users per segment is 5 million.

nested_items.name: s3DataSource
nested_items.description: The configuration details of an Amazon S3 input or output bucket.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The file path of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Key Management Service (KMS) key that Amazon Personalize uses to encrypt or decrypt the input and output files.

nested_items.name: jobOutput
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that contains the output data generated by the batch segment job.

nested_items.name: s3DataDestination
nested_items.description: The configuration details of an Amazon S3 input or output bucket.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The file path of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Key Management Service (KMS) key that Amazon Personalize uses to encrypt or decrypt the input and output files.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that requested the batch segment job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the batch segment job. The status is one of the following values:
PENDING.
IN PROGRESS.
ACTIVE.
CREATE FAILED.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the batch segment job was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the batch segment job last updated.
